author: weaver
msg: The getPortlet() method was moved up into the PortletAction class.

author: weaver
msg: - Fixed ClassCastExceptions caused by portlets that do not provide a customizer.
Thanks  to Mark Orciuch for noticing this out.
- Fixed the issue where the cusomizers buttons where appearing below the
portlets as opposed to above.  Thanks again to Mark Orciuch for pointing this out.

author: weaver
msg: - added protected getCurrentTemplate method that returns the correct
template to use based whether or not the PortletSessionState contains
a "template" attribute, if it does use that value otherwise query the

author: weaver
msg: - Added empty method signatures for buildConfigureContext(VelocityPortlet, Context, RunData)
buildMaximizedContext(VelocityPortlet, Context, RunData) to fix possible self-referencing
loop caused by sub-classes calling the super.* of either of these methods.

author: weaver
msg: - Removed calls to the newly deprecated setTemplate() method in JspAction
and now uses the methods provided by PortletAction
